Job Title: Staff Accountant

Location: Camden, NJ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Staff Accountant

This Jobot Job is hosted by Curt Weigel

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $70,000 - $75,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We are a successful nonprofit research institute.



Why join us?


! Meaningful work! Come join us as we are working on finding discoveries to solve many of the world's diseases.

Employee Pension - 7% contributions

20 days of PTO and 7 Personal Days and 13+ paid holidays!

Job Details

Staff Accountant - ADP Payroll - 7% Pension contributions

Our esteemed organization, a 50-year-old nonprofit research institute, is seeking a dynamic and detail-oriented Staff Accountant to join our Finance Department.

This role requires someone with strong ADP Payroll accounting experience. We are looking for someone to handle this!

Responsibilities

 Managing and executing the full cycle of accounting duties or tasks such as preparing financial statements, performing account analysis and reconciliation, maintaining the general ledger, preparing tax returns, assisting with audit preparations, and performing other accounting duties as assigned. Processing payroll in a timely and accurate manner, ensuring all payroll transactions are processed efficiently and that all employees are paid correctly. Invoicing customers for goods and services, and maintaining accurate records of all transactions. Proactively following up on outstanding payments, liaising with customers to resolve any discrepancies and to ensure timely payments. Participating in financial projects, such as annual budgeting, financial forecasting, and variance analysis. Ensuring compliance with all internal processes and legal requirements, maintaining up-to-date knowledge of industry laws and regulations related to accounting.

Qualifications

The successful candidate should possess the following qualifications

 Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field. Minimum of 3 years of experience in an accounting role, preferably within the finance industry. Strong experience in Payroll processing and Invoicing. (ADP) Candidates must exhibit a high level of proficiency in Excel

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
